title: Ottoman Empire Quiz
description: Explore the vast Ottoman Empire that spanned three continents and lasted over 600 years, from its rise to its dramatic end.

questions.question: Who was the founder of the Ottoman Empire in the late 13th century?
Which Ottoman sultan was known as 'the Magnificent' and presided over the empire's golden age?
What was the elite military corps of the Ottoman Empire, originally composed of Christian boys?
Which famous mosque in Istanbul was built under Sultan Ahmed I and is known for its blue tiles?
What title did the Ottoman sultan also hold as the leader of the Muslim world?
Which massive palace complex served as the main residence of Ottoman sultans for nearly 400 years?
In which century did the Ottoman Empire officially come to an end?
What was the Ottoman system of 'devshirme'?
options: Recruiting Christian boys for military and civil service

questions.question: Which European city did the Ottomans besiege twice (in 1529 and 1683) but failed to conquer?
What was the role of the Grand Vizier in the Ottoman Empire?
options: The sultan's chief minister and head of government

questions.question: Which country was established as the successor state to the Ottoman Empire in 1923?
Who was the leader who abolished the Ottoman sultanate and founded modern Turkey?
At its height, the Ottoman Empire controlled territories on how many continents?
What was the 'millet' system in the Ottoman Empire?
options: A system allowing religious communities to govern their own affairs

questions.question: On which side did the Ottoman Empire fight during World War I?
